resources.string: The worst trivia ever based on the worst movie ever! We have to maintain the tradition, so, we expect you to do the worst score! Make us proud!
Tell us how we should call you
Throughout this trivia, you will be asked to answer series of questions. In order to complete the challenge after answering each question please click on submit button.
What is the Room\'s release year?
What picture exists in every frame on the table in Johnny\'s living room?
For how long the Room is promoted on an enigmatic billboard?
Select two correct statements among the options given below
Complete the sentence: Tommy Wiseau wanted to include a flying … in the movie.
How many times Tommy Wiseau replaced the entire behind-the-camera team?
You are a true fan!\n It is nice to see one of us!
You don\'t seem like you belong here. \nNice try though!
Steven character, who joined the crew last minute got the lines of Peter character.
Johnny Character is based on famous actor, \"Leonardo DiCaprio\".
Wiseau wanted his cat to take part in the movie as his best friend.
